# The `Compressor` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a></code> is used to manipulate the bits of a (possibly signed) integer type so it can be packed and unpacked into a <code>bits</code> sized integer, <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a></code> is specialized on signed-ness so no runtime cost is incurred. <a href="#details">More...</a>

struct llvm::bitfields_details::Compressor&lt;T, Bits, bool&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a></code> is used to manipulate the bits of a (possibly signed) integer type so it can be packed and unpacked into a <code>bits</code> sized integer, <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a></code> is specialized on signed-ness so no runtime cost is incurred.

The <code>pack</code> method also checks that the passed in <code>UserValue</code> is valid.

Definition at line 121 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h">Bitfields.h</a>.
